welcome.title: Welcome to The Oven
welcome.text: In Arvika, we stand out. With carefully selected ingredients and pizzas baked in a genuine wood-fired oven, you can taste the difference right away. For us, great food and excellent service go hand in hand – that's why we put just as much heart into the kitchen as we do into the service. Our goal is to give you, as our guest, an experience beyond the ordinary. Welcome, and enjoy your meal!

section1.title: In the oven
section1.text:
An authentic Neapolitan pizza should, according to rules created by the organization Associazione Verace Pizza Napoletano, be round with a diameter of 30-35 centimeters, have high edges and be soft and elastic.

The dough consisting of wheat flour, yeast, salt and water should rise in different stages and then be formed flat and round by hand, without any help from rolling pins or mechanical presses.

The pizza should be cooked in a wood-fired oven.

questions.question: Do I need to book a table in advance?
questions.answer: We highly recommend booking a table in advance, especially on weekends and evenings. You can book by phone or by sending us an email.

questions.question: Do you accept cash?
questions.answer: We are a cash-free restaurant and only accept card payments.

questions.question: Can you accommodate allergies and special dietary needs?
questions.answer: Absolutely! Please let us know about any allergies or dietary restrictions when booking, and we'll make sure you enjoy a safe and delicious meal.

questions.question: Do you offer takeaway?
questions.answer: You can order takeaway directly from us for pick-up. If you'd prefer to have your food delivered straight to your door, it's quick and easy via Foodora, where you'll also find our full menu.

questions.question: Do you serve alcohol?
questions.answer: Yes, we are fully licensed to serve alcohol.

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.content: Theoven.se is operated by The Oven AB. We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This policy explains how we collect and process information on our website.

dataCollection.title: 2. Collection of personal data
dataCollection.content: We collect personal data in the following ways:
list: **Table bookings**: When you make a reservation, we collect your name, email address, and phone number to confirm your booking.
**Campaigns and offers**: When you sign up for our offers and promotions, we collect your mobile number to send you the offer and any future marketing messages.

**Photography**: Occasionally, photography may take place on our premises for marketing purposes. By being present in the venue, you consent to this. Please contact us if you wish to have a photo or video in which you appear removed.

dataUsage.title: 3. How we use your data
dataUsage.content: We use the collected information to:
list: Send promotional offers and marketing material (with your consent)
Communicate with you regarding your booking or visit

localStorage.title: 4. Local storage
localStorage.content: Our website uses local storage in your browser to enhance your user experience. This storage does NOT contain personal data but is only used to:
list: Remember if you have closed information modals
localStorage.note: You can clear this information at any time through your browser settings.

cookies.title: 5. Cookies and tracking
cookies.content: We do NOT use tracking cookies or analytics tools that collect behavioural data. We only use technically necessary local storage for basic website functionality.

rights.title: 6. Your rights
rights.content: Under GDPR, you have the following rights:
list: **Right of access**: You may request a copy of the personal data we hold about you
**Right to rectification**: You may request that we correct any inaccurate data
**Right to erasure**: You may request that we delete your data
**Right to object**: You may object to marketing at any time
**Right to withdraw consent**: You may withdraw your consent for campaigns and newsletters at any time
rights.unsubscribe: To unsubscribe from our newsletter or promotional messages, click the link below:

dataSharing.title: 7. Data sharing
dataSharing.content: We NEVER sell your personal data. We only share information with:
list: Email services to send booking confirmations
SMS services for campaigns and offers (only with your consent)

dataSecurity.title: 8. Security
dataSecurity.content: We take appropriate technical and organisational measures to protect your personal data from unauthorised access, loss, or misuse.

contact.title: 9. Contact us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or how we handle your personal data, please contact us:

changes.title: 10. Changes to this policy
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy when necessary. The latest revision date is always shown at the top of the page. We recommend checking this page regularly to stay informed.
